articles.title: Nicola Benedetti becomes first woman and first Scot to lead Edinburgh international festival - The Guardian
articles.description: Grammy and Brit-award-winning violinist will take over from Fergus Linehan after this year’s 75th anniversary event
articles.content:
Nicola Benedetti, the award-winning Scottish violinist, is to take over as director of the Edinburgh international festival, becoming the first woman to run the event.
